label: 藤原実綱
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1013-1082). Grandson of Arikuni. Son of the erudite" of literature Sukenari 資業. Father of Arinobu. Uncle of Atsumune. President of the court university and "erudite" of literature. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (2), Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集(2), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集(1), Wakan kensakushū. Prose composition in Honchō zoku monzui 本朝続文粋. Selector at the Tenjō shiawase. [有国、有信、敦宗、漢詩、和漢兼作集、殿上詩合] "
